data.title: Best seafood pasta in Miami
data.text:
This place is awesome for its fresh seafood and pasta combinations.
The environment is very trendy and chic. Their wines are tasty.

data.title: Quaint and cozy
data.text: Our family of 5 had a very nice dinner. It was late and there was only one other group in the restaurant so, the wait staff was very attentive with perfect timing to the tables needs. Many American waiters seem to have a knack for interrupting conversation at the table and are unaware of perfectly timed attentiveness. The food was very good and presentation gets an A+. Menu items were priced fairly.

data.title: good but
data.text: They recently renovated it but the food wasn't bad. Except our waiter was slow considering the Italian family near us was constantly wanting attention. We waited twenty five minutes just to get our check and leave. Food wasn't bad but I wouldn't recommend the pear on your pizza. I tried it, it was strange.

data.title: LOVE THIS RESTAURANT!
data.text: I haven't been there recently but we used to visit the place so many times. Food was always great, the service oustanding, you receive what you pay for, respect, professionalism, owner's attention and care, LOVE, LOVE. Location is not that popular or great, but we don't care to go. It is worthy...one of the best italian restaurants in miami...The best kept secret

data.title: In a Class by Itself!
data.text:
My husband and I had our wedding reception there a few months ago and what an incredible night.  Capriccio's truly made our night to remember a very special one.  Everything was perfect from beginning to end.  To this day our family and friends are still talking about it.  So, we decided to invite a few close friends and family members to join us for dinner there this past weekend.  Again, everything was perfect.  The food is truly in a class by itself.  It's the best Italian food we have eaten.  The staff are very attentive yet not pushy, the atmosphere is warm/intimate,  and the music... let's just say I even got my husband to dance!  He had to in order to burn off your excellent desserts!!!  In our book, you are the best Italian restaurant around and trust us, we've eaten all over the world.

Thank you again from some VERY loyal customers!

data.title: Muito bom
data.text:
Ambiente agradável, atendimento diferenciado e ótima comida. 
Preço um pouco acima do esperado, mas nada que atrapalhe o programa.

data.title: Super rica comida, lindo ambiente pero muy caro
data.text: El restaurante es bonito, tiene una ambientación italiana muy bien hecha. Pedimos de entrada la berenjena rellena que estaba deliciosa!  Después de plato fuerte pedimos una pasta rellena de picota y espinaca que estaba muy buena!  Lo que si es que el servicio puede estar mejor, aunque rápido no me trajeron un par de ocasiones la servilleta que pedí, y el precio se me hizo fuera de proporción, muy alto para lo que fue la cena.

data.title: Excelente comida italiana
data.text: Buena comida y un lindo lugar, con una linda vista de la bahia. Un buen ambiente, moderno y sofisticado,  para degustar buena comida y compartir

data.title: un poco di vera Italiansicula cucina in USA
data.text:
In USA, vi sono tanti ristoranti e pizzerie italiane, ma quasi tutte, con il tempo, si sono adattate allo stile "americano" del mangiare. Ti servono formaggio su spaghetti alle vongole e bolognese di pollo con salsa kechup.. Molto scettico, sono entrato nel Capriccio, di un siciliano di nome Gianfranco; subito ho capito, che avrei mangiato bene e .. "italiano verace". Un antipastino tutto siciliano, non molto vario, ma con.. una bella e buona "burrata" fatta nello stesso ristorante!. Mentre il titolare accompagnava i clienti cantando, con una discreta voce, canzoni tradizionali Italiane, mi servivano un risotto con frutti di mare semplicemente meraviglioso!!. Una buona e fresca frittura e un dolce della casa fantastico: "La Tarantella". 
 Ho pagato soddisfatto e sorpreso, Bell'ambiente, buona cucina e Ottttimo (con 4 T) risotto!!.
